Four giant rock pillars are summoned around the enemy, which then shoot bolts of lightning between them, immobilising the target and possibly doing great damage to them.

== Trivia ==
* Despite being classified as a [[Lightning Release]] technique, this technique actually creates rock as an initial part of the technique, like an [[Earth Release]] technique.
